definitions.meaning:
a part of an area of activity, especially of a country's economy 
（尤指一国经济的）部门，领域，行业

examples.content:
service-sector jobs (= in hotels, restaurants, etc.) 
服务性行业的工作

definitions.meaning:
a part of a particular area, especially an area under military control 
（尤指军事管制的）区域，地带

examples.content:
each sector of the war zone 
战区的每个军控地段

definitions.meaning:
( geometry 几何 ) a part of a circle lying between two straight lines drawn from the centre to the edge 
扇形
